label: 放出
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: An enlargement to the living space of a house, though its precise nature is a little unclear.  It seems to have been made by removing the partitions (blinds, sliding panels) between the chamber and the aisle, but the word may sometimes also refer to an extension to the existing structure. [RK]
